description:
On the way to her new school, Cocoa meets a girl in traditional Japanese clothes named Chiya. It turns out Chiya will be attending the same high school as Cocoa, and her hobby is giving original names to the Japanese sweets she makes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Komugi o Aishita Shoujo to Azuki ni Aisareta Shoujo
La fille qui aimait la farine et une fille aimée par les haricots sucrés
The Girl Who Loved Wheat and the Girl Loved by Azuki Beans
小麦を愛した少女と小豆に愛された少女
